title: Diary of a backpack
creator_credit: Gabrielle Guaran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Gabrielle Guaran’s backpack tells of all the adventures taken with her owner, a woman with Turner’s Syndrome. Depsite getting old, Guaran hasn’t given up on her backpack, in much the same way she refuses to give up on the life she wants to lead.
creator_credit_for_label: Gabrielle Guaran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
